customer_name: Wallaby Tales LLC Eyes of the Wild
site_name: Wallaby Tales, LLC. Eyes of the Wild

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
Records, such as the Program of Veterinary Care, contingency plan and disposition records were unavailable for review
during this inspection. These records are necessary for the APHIS official to review so as to ensure that the animals have
appropriate vet care; a contingency plan to provide for their safety during emergencies, and when animals have been
disposed.
(a) Each dealer, exhibitor, intermediate handler, or carrier, shall, during business hours, allow APHIS officials:
(a)(2) To examine records required to be kept by the Act and the regulations in this part;
Facility should have the necessary documentation available for review during inspections.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: APRIL 17, 2025
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
Records, such as the Program of Veterinary Care, contingency plan and disposition records were unavailable for review 
during this inspection. These records are necessary for the APHIS official to review so as to ensure that the animals have 
appropriate vet care; a contingency plan to provide for their safety during emergencies, and when animals have been 
disposed. 
 
(a) Each dealer, exhibitor, intermediate handler, or carrier, shall, during business hours, allow APHIS officials: 
 
(a)(2) To examine records required to be kept by the Act and the regulations in this part; 
 
Facility should have the necessary documentation available for review during inspections. 
 
TO BE CORRECTED BY: APRIL 17, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representative.
